alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walker, south central Dade and northwestern Chattooga Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Desoto State Park, or 9 miles northeast of Fort Payne, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Menlo, Center Post and Cloudland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
